name: 以利亚·J·罗伯茨
name_full: 以利亚·J·罗伯茨 Elijah J. Roberts
introduction: Elijah J .Roberts is an upcoming artist who thrives off of his creativity and discipline. He is a well established athlete competing at one of the best Division 2 track teams in the country . Elijah earned him self a bronze medal at the 2023 conference championship meet in the high jump event competing for Academy of Art University.His passion for the arts has lead him to Academy of Art University to study Acting.While being a student athlete he managed to land roles in variety of independent films, feature films and theater.Elijah won best actor in a drama at the NXTUP2023 Festival for the short film "The Way it Use To" directed by Elliot Slade.This was his first acting award while being in school.Elijah Roberts has made his mark in Hollywood starring in the next huge BlumHouse Horror NightSwim(2024) playing supporting character "Ronin"...We hope to keep seeing big things from the young star Elijah Roberts whether that be on stage or the big screen for many years to come.
